CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Carlyle Credit Income Fund Shares of Beneficial Interest

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: The investment seeks income.The fund invests substantially all its assets in incomeproducing first lien whole loans secured by residential real estate. Up to 10% of the loans may be delinquent or in default at the time of acquisition. The fund will not purchase loans that currently are in foreclosure however loans acquired by the fund may go into foreclosure subsequent to acquisition by the fund. It may invest up to approximately 10% of its assets in loans that are classified as subprime at the time of purchase by the fund. The fund invests substantially all its assets in income-producing first lien whole loans secured by residential real estate. Up to 10% of the loans may be delinquent or in default at the time of acquisition. The fund will not purchase loans that currently are in foreclosure; however, loans acquired by the fund may go into foreclosure subsequent to acquisition by the fund.
